price: Basi hukumu ya Mola wetu Mlezi imekwisha tuthibitikia. Hakika bila ya shaka tutaonja tu adhabu.
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ
footnotes: Basi neno la Mola wetu Mlezi limethibiti juu yetu. Hakika hapana shaka sisi tutaionja adhabu ya Siku ya Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
